alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 8:43PM EDT until July 19 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Columbia County in east central Georgia... Northeastern Richmond County in east central Georgia... Southern Edgefield County in central South Carolina... Aiken County in central South Carolina... Western Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... Southeastern McCormick County in central South Carolina... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 842 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hamilton Branch State Park to South Augusta, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Martinez, Aiken Mall, Augusta, Clearwater, Belvedere, Edgefield, New Ellenton, Jackson, Glendale, South Augusta, Edgefield County Airport, Midtown, Summerville, Augusta Mall, Daniel Field, Citizens Park, Augusta Regional Airport and Village Plaza Shopping Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 196 and 201. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 0 and 35. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 16 and 23. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
